bug.author: aqzwy
bug.description:
I can not use the pandas_profiling in python 3.5.3,it report the err <denchmark-h:h3>TemplateSyntaxError: Encountered unknown tag 'with'.</denchmark-h>
import pandas_profiling import pandas as pd dd = pd.read_csv('./company.csv',encoding='utf-8') pandas_profiling.ProfileReport(dd)

comments.comment: You should be able to manually resolve this by updating jinja.
After update jinja via pip install -U jinja2 and restart python kernel, this is issus was fixed. Thank you.
